titles.title: ANCSA Land Transfer Equity Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to settle claims arising from the contamination of transferred lands, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16228-16229)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Senate Committee on Indian Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. ANCSA Land Transfer Equity Act of 1993 - Amends the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to provide for the settlement of claims arising from the contamination of transferred lands by either contaminant removal or land replacement. States that the United States shall assume all liabilities and obligations arising from such contaminated land transfers.
